context: The war was fought <a0_0><b3_0>primarily <a0_3>along the <a0_2>frontiers<a0_3/> <a0_1>between New France and the British colonies<b3_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>, from <a0_4>Virginia in the South to Nova Scotia in the North<a0_4/>.
